caption.p: MEAN ENSEMBLE predicted maps for R. bupleuroides, R. quadrifida, and species group for the Last inter-glacial (LIG ca. 120,000â€“140,000 years BP), the Last glacial maximum (LGM ca. 21,000 years BP), current and future (2050). ENM predicted results were processed by ArcGIS ver 10.2 (ESRI, Redlands, California, USA) ( http://www.esri.com/), and then integrated using Microsoft Office Visio 2013 ( http://office.microsoft.com/visio/).
